1.content: Deploy SolClock to Vercel with mock data
1.details:
1. ✅ Fixed Vercel build error by removing pnpm-store dependency
2. ✅ Updated pnpm-lock.yaml to match package.json
3. ✅ Added .pnpmrc configuration for proper pnpm store locations
4. ✅ Created vercel.json for explicit build configuration
5. ✅ Updated package.json build script to disable frozen lockfile
6. ✅ Successfully tested local build without /tmp errors
7. ✅ Committed and pushed fix to GitHub (commit 316c915)
8. ✅ Simplifed gitignore to resolve /tmp references
9. ✅ Pushed simplified configuration (commit dd398ed)
10. ✅ Awaiting Vercel deployment completion
11. ⏳ Vercel should now work with simplified Next.js config

2.content: Set up Supabase database from scratch
2.details:
1. ✅ Opened Supabase dashboard and navigated to SQL Editor
2. ✅ Loaded and executed supabase-schema.sql
3. ✅ Created all 8 required tables
4. ✅ Set up Row Level Security policies
5. ✅ Configured database indexes
6. ✅ Verified table creation
7. ✅ Set up Vercel environment variables

3.content: Replace mock data with real Supabase integration
3.details:
1. ✅ Updated API routes to fetch from Supabase
2. ✅ Implemented real data fetching functions
3. ✅ Added error handling for empty database
4. ✅ Created sample data generator for testing
5. ✅ Optimized performance with caching
6. ✅ Maintained backward compatibility
7. ✅ Created comprehensive documentation

4.content: Test and optimize the complete system
4.details:
1. Test all pages with real data
2. Verify performance and loading states
3. Add loading indicators where needed
4. Final deployment verification

5.content: Integrate Solscan API for real Solana blockchain data
5.details:
1. Replace mock data generator with Solscan API calls
2. Implement real-time token price and volume data
3. Set up whale transaction monitoring ($10k+)
4. Connect network statistics to live blockchain data
5. Add real-time price alerts and notifications
6. Implement proper API rate limiting and caching
7. Test and optimize the complete system
8. Total timeline: 2-3 weeks
